trans-unit.source: Defines the base class for classes in the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar"></xref> namespace that correspond to the elements in an SRGS grammar.
trans-unit.target: 클래스에 대 한 기본 클래스를 정의 고 <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar"> </xref> SRGS 문법의 요소에 해당 하는 네임 스페이스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The SrgsElement class is the base class for the following classes, which correspond to elements defined in the [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761): - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken> Two additional classes inherit from SrgsElement and represent the text contained within the classes listed above (SrgsText), and recognition matching modes (SrgsSubset): - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSubset> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText>
trans-unit.target: SrgsElement 클래스는 기본 클래스에 정의 된 요소에 해당 하는 다음 클래스는 [음성 인식 문법 사양 (SRGS) 버전 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761):- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken>두 개의 추가 클래스 SrgsElement에서 상속 하 고 (SrgsText) 위에 나열 된 클래스 내에 포함 된 텍스트를 나타내는 및 모드 (SrgsSubset)와 일치 하는 인식:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSubset>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSubset> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement"></xref> class.
